title: Please Riot Fix VICTIORIOUS WARD SKIN 2016 ( WARD REVERSE )
body:
hello riot and everybody . i speak eng not good and i dont know how can i post picture on here .
so i will try to let you know my problem . before i post my discussion and riot dont understand what i mean . so now i try to let riot know .
before season end riot post this Ward skin on website ( PLEASE CLICK THIS LINK AND CHECK WITH 45 POITN WARD SKIN ) and you guy will see VICTORIOUS WARD SKIN 2016 .

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon

But when season end . and i get reward . but my VICTORIOUS SKIN 2016 REVERSE WITH WARD SKIN WHEN RIOT POST ON WEBSITE .
PLEASE CHECK 2 WEB AND YOU WILL SEE REAL DIFFERENT . THIS WARD REVERSE .

PLEASE RIOT LOOK WITH THIS VIDEO ON 0:59 AND CHECK WITH WARD SKIN WHEN RIOT POST BEFORE SEASON END IN WEBSITE .

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YE2Nhdm5yFk

I SWEAR I HAVE 45 POITN AND I GET VICTORIOUS WARD SKIN 2016 .

ONE AGAIN I WANT TO SAY THANKS YOU FOR ALL PEOPLE READ MY DISCUSSION AND THANKS RIOT GAME SO MUCH

replies.body:
I checked your account and it appears you have the right ward skin. Can you grab a screenshot in-game to show what you're seeing? Hit F12 in-game, then locate the screenshot in the following directory:

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Screenshots

Upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/), then paste the link in a reply. Thanks!

THANKS YOU SO MUCH TARGONS BLADE. NOW I  CAN POST PICTURE HERE ! 

OK!  LET ME START AGAIN . THIS IS  VICTORIOUS WARD SKIN 2016 RIOT POST ON THE WEBSITE 

http://imgur.com/a/8JH6H 

AND THIS IS WARD SKIN WHEN END SEASON IN LOBBY

http://imgur.com/a/zpZrw

AND THIS IS IN GAME 

http://imgur.com/a/zH9Y8

PLEASE CHECK HELP ME TARGONS :(  REAL DIFFERENT

ONE AGAIN I REALY THANKS YOU SO MUCH FOR HELP ME :(

Thanks for providing those screenshots. We'll need to thoroughly investigate what's going on with this and try making some changes to your account. I'd like you to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can do this.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.
what can i do now ? report in your web you give me ? or waitting ? im stupid english targons =.=

Actually, given the information that *Breaku* provided, I think it would be better to report this on our [Bug Tracker](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) so we can follow this.

Thanks!

It's not an issue with OP's account, the ward skin is legit just upside down when compared to what's on the ward skin select screen as well as what's on the website.

http://prntscr.com/dabsvg
thanks God you understand me. OMG
